tabs.tab_title: ‚ùì How long do I have access to the materials?
tabs.tab_content: Access depends on your chosen plan: 7 days, 30 days, or lifetime. All materials remain available during your access period, and you can download practice questions for offline study. The lifetime plan gives you access forever, including all future updates!

Yes! We offer a 30-day 100% money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with our program or don't pass your exam after following our study plan, we'll refund your purchase in full - no questions asked!

tabs.tab_title: ‚ùì Are the practice questions similar to the real exam?
tabs.tab_content: Absolutely! Our questions are created by certified nursing professionals and are based on the actual CNA exam format and content areas. 98% of our students report that our questions are very similar to what they saw on the real test.

tabs.tab_title: ‚ùì Can I access the course on my mobile device?
tabs.tab_content: Yes! Our platform is fully mobile-optimized, and we also offer a dedicated mobile app for iOS and Android. Study anywhere, anytime - on your commute, during breaks, or at home!

tabs.tab_title: ‚ùì Do you provide certificates upon completion?
tabs.tab_content: While we provide a completion certificate for our course, please note that this is not the official CNA certification. You'll need to take the state exam to become officially certified. Our program prepares you to pass that official exam!

tabs.tab_title: ‚ùì What makes your program different from others?
tabs.tab_content: Our program has a 98% pass rate and is created by actual certified nursing assistants. We offer 1,000+ practice questions, HD video lessons, mobile access, and personalized study schedules. Plus, we're the only program that offers 1-on-1 coaching calls!
